name: SocialWhale
overview:
Social Whale is a social media client that merges and filters all of your social media sources and creates an easier to handle personalized information feed. It provides an easy way to update your networks, organize information in groups, tag the updates, schedule status updates and many more.

Finally, there is a simple REST API that developers can use in order to access all of their networks in a transparent way.
